EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_MigratingOracleToGPonAWS_WP_Q217.Confirmation - Migra
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading our white paper!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Migrating Oracle Analytical Workloads to Pivotal Greenplum® on the AWS Marketplace white paper. We hope you found it informative and helpful.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]>
- White Paper: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation-white-paper]]>
- Webinar Replay: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation]]>
- Case Study: Aridhia - Creating a Platform to Power the Next Generation of Clinical and Translational Informatics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/aridhia]]>
- Case Study: O’Reilly Media - Enabling Rapid Analysis of Huge Quantities of Data <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/oreilly]]>
- Community Video: Learn about the Greenplum Database <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sn971CLnTxI]]>
- Learn More: Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum]]>
- Download: Greenplum Sandbox <[[http://greenplum.org/]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
